Introduction to Quantitative Research Methods for Public Administrators Preface

Introduction to Quantitative Research Methods for Public Administrators Tobias Schwoerer 2019-02-25 Preface Welcome to the computer lap portion of PADM 604: Research Methods in Public Administration. This four week portion of the course will introduce you to R, a language and environment for statistical computing and graphics the programming language. R is available for free and runs on Linux, Windows, and MacOS. To find out more go to R-Project
